pullrequest.title: Create a Buggy plugin using ODE to demonstrate the buggyDemo

content.raw:
Tried with ` sudo apt-get install libode-dev `, which will install ode version of `0.13.1`    
The `dJointSetHinge2Axes` function is not defined.    
For now, compile ODE > 0.15.1 from source and install is the only way to test out this plugin
content.html:
Tried with sudo apt-get install libode-dev, which will install ode version of 0.13.1
The dJointSetHinge2Axes function is not defined.
For now, compile ODE > 0.15.1 from source and install is the only way to test out this plugin
